title: Death Sworn Katarina is a cheating skin
body:
Please deactivate the skin.
PLEASE DONT RELEASE IT WHEN IT IS BUGGED.
I WILL POST THIS AGAIN IF IT GETS DELETED AGAIN. I DONT CARE
I posted this normally, not in this way. And btw, if a thread is in the wrong directory, just move it INSTEAD OF DELETING IT.

replies.body:
nice informative post.

you really did a good job at listing up the problems and came up with good solutions.

10/10 quality post
I did in a recent post

Hi Chemist Singed. 

When reporting a bug please use [this format](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug). I totally get that a bug can be frustrating, but you aren't describing what's actually causing the skin to be what you're considering 'cheating'. 

If you're referring to the SFX being lower than normal, this is something that is fixed for the next patch. If you're referring to something else, please let me know.
